remark.ch: 通訊系110學年度起入學學生之B組(資通訊組)必修課。

goal.en: This course provides an introduction to the theory and models of computational problems. It covers the common algorithms, algorithmic paradigms, and data structures used to solve these problems. In addition, the course emphasizes the relationship among algorithms, programming, and fundamental analysis techniques for these problems.
goal.ch: 本課程將簡介計算機運算問題的理論與模型，內容包含基本演算法、演算法原理、以及相關資料結構。課程內容強調演算法、程式設計、與基本分析方法之間的關聯性。

content.en:
1 Introduction
2 Asymptotic Notations
3 Divide and Conquer
4 Sorting
5 Data Structures
6 Greedy Algorithms
7 Dynamic Programming
8 Midterm Exam
9 Graph Algorithms
10 Graph Algorithms
11 Graph Algorithms
12 Computational Complexity
13 Computational Complexity
14 Approximation Algorithms
15 Advanced Topics
16 Final Exam

textbook.en: Cormen, Thomas, Charles Leiserson, Ronald Rivest, and Clifford Stein. Introduction to Algorithms. 4th ed. MIT Press, 2022. ISBN: 9780262046305.
textbook.ch: Cormen, Thomas, Charles Leiserson, Ronald Rivest, and Clifford Stein. Introduction to Algorithms. 4th ed. MIT Press, 2022. ISBN: 9780262046305.
